alert.note: Alert for Grant; La Salle; Natchitoches; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 3:36PM CDT until March 26 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Grant Parish in north central Louisiana... Southeastern Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... West central La Salle Parish in north central Louisiana... Southeastern Winn Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 335 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Flatwoods, or 9 miles northwest of Lena, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Colfax, Montgomery, Dry Prong, Georgetown, Zenoria, Lake Iatt, Chopin, Aloha, Bentley, Williana and Rochelle. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Louisiana.
